tuv.seg: A sender shall:
发送者应：
Bit 6 shall be set to zero if the encoding is primitive, and shall be set to one if the encoding is constructed.
如果编码是原始的，则第 6 位应设置为零，如果编码是结构，则应设置为 1。

Bits 8 to 1 of the first subsequent octet, followed by bits 8 to 1 of the second subsequent octet, followed in turn by bits 8 to 1 of each further octet up to and including the last subsequent octet, shall be the encoding of an unsigned binary integer equal to the number of octets in the contents octets, with bit 8 of the first subsequent octet as the most significant bit.
第一个后续八位字节的第 8 位到第 1 位，接着是第二个后续八位字节的第 8 位到第 1 位，接着是每个另外的八位字节的第 8 位到第 1 位，直到并包括最后一个后续八位字节，应该是无符号二进制整数的编码，等于内容八位字节中的八位字节数，第一个后续八位字节的第 8 位作为最高有效位。
Figure 3 illustrates the form of an identifier octet for a type with a tag whose number is in the range zero to 30 (inclusive).
图 3 说明了具有标签的类型的标识符八位字节的形式，该标签的编号在 0 到 30(包括 0 和 30)的范围内。
Figure 3 – Identifier octet (low tag number)
图 3 - 标识符八位字节(低标签号)
Figure 4 illustrates the form of the identifier octets for a type with a tag whose number is greater than 30.
图 4 说明了具有其编号大于 30 的标签的类型的标识符八位字节的形式。
For tags with a number greater than or equal to 31, the identifier shall comprise a leading octet followed by one or more subsequent octets.
对于数字大于或等于 31 的标签，标识符应包括前导八位字节，后跟一个或多个后续八位字节。
For tags with a number ranging from zero to 30 (inclusive), the identifier octets shall compri se a single octet encoded as follows:
对于编号范围从 0 到 30(含)的标签，标识符八位字节应包含如下编码的单个八位字节：

For the definite form, the length octets shall consist of one or more octets, and shall represent the number of octets in the contents octets using either the short form (see 8.1.3.4) or the long form (see 8.1.3.5) as a sender's option.
对于确定形式，长度八位字节应由一个或多个八位字节组成，并应使用短格式(见 8.1.3.4)或长格式(见 8.1.3.5)表示内容八位字节中的八位字节数，根据发送者的选择。
For the indefinite form, the length octets indicate that the contents octets are terminated by end-of contents octets (see 8.1.5), and shall consist of a single octet.
对于不定形式，长度八位字节表示内容八位字节由结束内容八位字节终止(见 8.1.5)，并且应由一个八位字节组成。
ITU-T X.680 | ISO/IEC 8824-1 specifies that the tag of a type defined using the CHOICE keyword takes the value of the tag of the type from which the chosen data value is taken.
ITU-T X.680 | ISO/IEC 8824-1 规定使用 CHOICE 关键字定义的类型的标记采用从中获取所选数据值的类型的标记的值。

ITU-T X.681 | ISO/IEC 8824-2, 14.2 and 14.4, specifies that the tag of a type defined using "ObjectClassFieldType" is indeterminate if it is a type field, a variable-type value field, or a variable-type value set field.
ITU-T X.681 | ISO/IEC 8824-2,14.2 和 14.4 规定，如果类型字段，变量类型值字段或变量类型值集字段，使用“ObjectClassFieldType”定义的类型的标记是不确定的。
Identifier octets
标识符八位字节
If this form of length is used, then end-of-contents octets (see 8.1.5) shall be present in the encoding following the contents octets.
如果使用这种形式的长度，则在内容八位字节之后的编码中应存在内容结束八位字节(见 8.1.5)。
In the long form, the length octets shall consist of an initial octet and one or more subsequent octets.
在长形式中，长度八位字节应由初始八位字节和一个或多个后续八位字节组成。

In the short form, the length octets shall consist of a single octet in which bit 8 is zero and bits 7 to 1 encode the number of octets in the contents octets (which may be zero), as an unsigned binary integer with bit 7 as the most significant bit.
在短格式中，长度八位字节应由单个八位字节组成，其中位 8 为零，位 7 到 1 编码内容八位字节中的八位字节数(可以为零)，作为无符号二进制整数，位 7 为最高位。
Length octets
长度八位字节
NOTE 1 – This restriction is introduced for possible future extension.
注 1 - 引入此限制以便将来可能的扩展。
NOTE 2 – In the long form, it is a sender's option whether to use more length octets than the minimum necessary.
注 2 - 在长形式中，发送者可以选择是否使用比最小必要值更长的八位字节。
NOTE – Subsequent subclauses specify whether the encoding is primitive or constructed for each type.
注 - 后续子条款为每种类型指定编码是原始的还是为结构的。
NOTE – The short form can only be used if the number of octets in the contents octets is less than or equal to 127.
注 - 只有当内容八位字节中的八位字节数小于或等于 127 时，才能使用短格式。
Table 1 – Encoding of class of tag
表 1 - 标签类的编码
The identifier octets shall encode the ASN.1 tag (class and number) of the type of the data value.
标识符八位字节应编码数据值类型的 ASN.1 标记(类和编号)。
The initial octet shall be encoded as follows:
初始八位字节应编码如下：
The leading octet shall be encoded as follows:
前导八位组的编码如下：
The single octet shall have bit 8 set to one, and bits 7 to 1 set to zero.
单个八位字节应将第 8 位设置为 1，将第 7 位设置为 0。
The subsequent octets shall encode the number of the tag as follows:
随后的八位字节应编码标签的编号，如下所示：
These are:
这些是：
This type is subsequently defined to be an ASN.1 type, and the complete encoding is then identical to that of a value of the assigned type (including the identifier octets).
随后将此类型定义为 ASN.1 类型，然后完整编码与指定类型的值(包括标识符八位字节)相同。
Two forms of length octets are specified.
指定了两种形式的长度八位字节。
a) bit 8 of each octet shall be set to one unless it is the last octet of the identifier octets;
a)每个八位字节的第 8 位应设置为 1，除非它是标识符八位字节的最后一个八位字节；
a) bit 8 shall be one;
a)第 8 位应为 1；
a) bits 8 and 7 shall be encoded to represent the class of the tag as listed in Table 1;
a)第 8 和第 7 位应编码以表示表 1 中列出的标签类；
a) bits 8 and 7 shall be encoded to represent the class of the tag as specified in Table 1;
a)应对第 8 和第 7 位进行编码，以表示表 1 中规定的标签类；
a) the definite form (see 8.1.3.3); and
a) use the definite form (see 8.1.3.3) if the encoding is primitive;
a)如果编码是原始的，则使用确定形式(见 8.1.3.3)；
b) bit 6 shall be a zero or a one according to the rules of 8.1.2.5;
b)根据 8.1.2.5 的规则，第 6 位应为零或一；
b) bits 7 to 1 shall encode the number of subsequent octets in the length octets, as an unsigned binary integer with bit 7 as the most significant bit;
b)第 7 到 1 应编码长度八位字节中后续八位字节的数目，作为无符号二进制整数，其中第 7 位为最高有效位；

b) bits 7 to 1 of the first subsequent octet, followed by bits 7 to 1 of the second subsequent octet, followed in turn by bits 7 to 1 of each further octet, up to and including the last subsequent octet in the identifier octets shall be the encoding of an unsigned binary integer equal to the tag number, with bit 7 of the first subsequent octet as the most significant bit;
b)第一个后续八位字节的第 7 位到第 1 位，然后是第二个后续八位字节的第 7 位到第 1 位，接着是每个另外的八位字节的第 7 位到第 1 位，直到并包括标识符八位字节中的最后一个后续八位字节（的第 7 位到第 1 位），是无符号二进制整数的编码，等于标记号，第一个后续八位字节的第 7 位作为最高有效位；
b) the indefinite form (see 8.1.3.6).
b) use either the definite form (see 8.1.3.3) or the indefinite form (see 8.1.3.6), a sender's option, if the encoding is constructed and all immediately available;
b)使用确定的形式(见 8.1.3.3)或不确定形式(见 8.1.3.6)，根据发送者的选择，如果编码是结构的并且全部立即可用；
c) bits 5 to 1 shall be encoded as 111112.
c) 5 到 1 位应编码为 11111（二进制）。
c) bits 5 to 1 shall encode the number of the tag as a binary integer with bit 5 as the most significant bit.
c) 5 到 1 位应将标签的编号编码为二进制整数，其中第 5 位为最高有效位。
c) bits 7 to 1 of the first subsequent octet shall not all be zero.
c)第一个后续八位位组的第 7 位到第 1 位不应全为零。
c) use the indefinite form (see 8.1.3.6) if the encoding is constructed and is not all immediately available.
c)如果编码是构造的并且并非全部立即可用，则使用不确定形式(见 8.1.3.6)。
